name: Phase 1 - Initiation
description: Initial phase of the project focusing on setup and kickoff.

name: Phase 2 - Planning
description: Establishes project scope, objectives, resources, and timelines.

name: Phase 3 - Design
description: Defines architecture, technical specifications, and system blueprint.

name: Phase 4 - Implementation
description: Covers development, configuration, and integration of components.

name: Phase 5 - Testing
description: Ensures solution quality and stability through validation and verification.

name: Phase 6 - Deployment
description: Handles system rollout and transition to production environment.

name: Phase 7 - Operation
description: Focuses on maintaining system performance and resolving issues.

name: Phase 8 - Optimization
description: Analyzes performance and implements improvements or refinements.

name: Phase 9 - Evaluation
description: Reviews project outcomes against objectives and KPIs.

name: Phase 10 - Closure
description: Finalizes all activities, completes documentation, and formally closes the project.
